name: VideoLightBox
title: Video jQuery Lightbox - Embed video to your website with beautiful Lightbox effect!
description: Video LightBox for jQuery is a free extension that helps you easily embed video to website, web page or blog. * Embed flv, mp4, 3gp video files * Add Youtube, Facebook, Google Video, Metacafe, Vimeo, MySpace videos * XHTML compliant * Automatic thumbnail creation * Adding caption
